headline: Major Infrastructure Investment and Rate Hike Proposal Might Change the Case For Investing In American Water Works (AWK)
summary: American Water Works Company, through its Pennsylvania-American Water subsidiary, recently filed a request with the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission to raise water and wastewater rates in support of about US$1.2 billion in capital investments planned or completed between June 2025 and mid-2027, with proposed new rates potentially taking effect in August 2026. An important detail is the inclusion of a pilot program to help low-income renters manage utility costs, reflecting a commitment...
